kdl.prox.script
Class SNA

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.script.SNA

public class SNA
extends java.lang.Object

Defines various Social Network Analysis static methods.

Note: The methods in this class are certainly not optimized for speed, and can be very slow when run against large databases such as the IMDB.

computeBetweennessCentrality

public static void computeBetweennessCentrality(Container inputContainer,
                                                java.lang.String outputAttrName,
                                                boolean isUndirected)
Implements the betweenness centrality algorithm for unweighted graphs, as described in "A Faster Algorithm for Betweenness Centrality", U. Brandes, Journal of Mathematical Sociology 25(2):163-177, 2001.

The betweenness centrality for a node v counts the number of shortest paths between all other nodes in the graph that contain v. Note that a path of length 1 does not contribute to these scores because there is no interior node.

Parameters:
inputContainer -
outputAttrName -
isUndirected -

computeClusteringCoefficient

public static void computeClusteringCoefficient(Container inputContainer,
                                                java.lang.String outputAttrName)
Calculates the clustering coefficient for objects either in a container or in the entire db. Notes:

  • does not save values for objects with fewer than 2 neighbors
  • treats links as undirected

Parameters:
inputContainer - input container. pass null to run on entire database
outputAttrName - name of object attribute to save coefficients into
